meanings.definition: A type of red wine made from Cabernet Sauvignon grapes.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious cabernets to all the guests.
meanings.sent2: I bought three cabernets to pair with the steak dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cabernets at the wine tasting were so popular, they disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cabernets was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cabernets filled the room, enticing everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: Plural form of cabernet, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of Cabernet wine.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had a wide selection of cabernets from different regions.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the cabernets with friends during our weekend getaway.
meanings.sent3: As the evening progressed, the cabernets seemed to dance in the candlelight.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with cabernets of various vintages and labels.
meanings.sent5: The clinking of glasses filled the air as the cabernets were poured into each one.
